Recommendations: 1. A functional Faculty Development Program should be implemented.
2. The faculty should be encouraged to foster professional growth through membership in professional organizations and honor societies.
3. The syllabi should be reviewed, revised, enriched and written in an acceptable and uniform format. Appropriate teaching strategies and a grading system must be reflected.
4. To ensure better service, payment of overloads should be on time.
5. The faculty may be motivated to conduct tracer studies to establish the relevance and effectiveness of the program and of the faculty.
